mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, John Augustine Washington III to Nathaniel Tyler (draft), 1858 August 13
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, John Augustine, III, 1821-1861
mdRecord.dcterms:description: (Typed transcription enclosed) Thanks him for his letter about the calumnies in some Northern newspapers but has no desire to enter into a controversy with the papers. Autograph letter (draft) signed, 1 pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: John Augustine Washington III and Mount Vernon Ladies' Association (MVLA) collection
